pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Pharmacokinetics (PK) of Multi-Component Drugs Using a Metabolomics Approach // Poly-PK strategy is a new strategy of pharmacokinetic analysis of multi-component drugs (Guoxiang Xie, Tianlu Chen, Wei Jia, et al. (2012)doi:10.1021/pr300318m; Ke Lan, Guoxiang Xie and Wei Jia. (2013)doi:10.1155/2013/819147). This package is the first implementation of the Poly-PK strategy with 10 easy-to-use functions.
